app.title: Playlist Exporter
app.description: Export your playlists to CSV and JSON format. View, manage, and download your playlist data easily.

config.title: Configuration Required
config.step2: Add your Google OAuth Client ID

auth.readOnlyAccess: This app only requests read-only access to your YouTube playlists.
auth.trademarkDisclaimer: YouTube and Google are trademarks of Google LLC. This application is not created, endorsed, or affiliated with Google.
auth.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.

login.title: Playlist Exporter
login.description: View and export your playlists to CSV or JSON format. Sign in with your Google account to get started.

playlists.title: Your Playlists
playlists.description: Select a playlist to view its contents and export to CSV or JSON.

emptyPlaylist.title: Empty playlist
emptyPlaylist.description: This playlist doesn't have any videos yet.

noPlaylists.title: No playlists found
noPlaylists.description: You don't have any playlists yet. Create a playlist on YouTube and come back here to export it.

noChannel.title: No YouTube channel
noChannel.description: Your Google account doesn't have a YouTube channel yet. Create one to start building playlists.
noChannel.warningDescription: Your Google account doesn't have a YouTube channel yet. A channel is required to create and manage playlists.
noChannel.createInfo: Creating a channel is free, takes only a few seconds, and
noChannel.noVideosRequired: does not require you to publish any videos

systemPlaylists.title: Missing playlists?
systemPlaylists.description: Unfortunately, the YouTube API doesn't provide access to system playlists such as "Watch Later" or "Liked Videos". You need to create a playlist on YouTube to see it here.

quota.title: API Quota Exceeded
quota.message: The YouTube API daily quota has been exceeded. This limit is shared across all users of this application.
quota.resetTime: The quota resets at midnight Pacific Time (PT).
quota.explanation: This is a limitation of the YouTube Data API. Each application has a daily quota of API requests. Please try again after the quota resets.
quota.errorMessage: YouTube API quota exceeded. Please try again tomorrow.

footer.privacyFirst: Privacy First: We don't get your data. See
footer.demoWarning: PRIVATE DEMO - Not configured for general public access
